resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103067</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103067</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lasers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lasers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lasers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέιζερ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lasers</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Create a laser by pumping the chamber with a photon beam. Manage the energy states of the laser's atoms to control its output.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie einen Laser her, indem Sie den Raum 
mit einem Photonlichtstrahl pumpen. Handhaben Sie die 
Energiezustände der Atome des Lasers, um seine Ausgabe zu steuern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créez un laser en pompant la chambre avec un 
faisceau de photon. Parvenez les états d'énergie des atomes du
laser pour contrôler sa sortie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Críe um laser bombeando a câmara com um feixe de
photon. Controle os estados da energia dos átomos do laser 
controlar sua saída.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crei un laser pompando l'alloggiamento con un 
fascio di fotoni. Gestisca l'energia dichiara degli 
atomi del laser per gestire la relativa uscita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργήστε ένα λέιζερ με την άντληση της αίθουσας 
με μια ακτίνα φωτονίων. Κατορθώστε τις ενεργειακές 
καταστάσεις των ατόμων του λέιζερ για να ελέγξετε την έξοδό του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cree un laser bombeando el compartimiento con una 
viga de fotón. Maneje los estados de la energía de los átomos
del laser para controlar su salida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103067</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/lasers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
